<!-- ### Verbal/Language -->

```{r}
#| label: data-verbal
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(bwu)

# which csv file to use
pheno <- "verbal"

if (pheno == "adhd" || pheno == "emotion") {
  csv <- "neurobehav.csv"
} else {
  csv <- "neurocog.csv"
}

# read data
file_path <- file.path(csv)
data <- readr::read_csv(file_path)
```

```{r}
#| label: text-verbal
#| cache: true
library(glue)
library(purrr)
library(dplyr)

data_text <-
  data |>
  dplyr::arrange(dplyr::desc(percentile)) |>
  dplyr::distinct(.keep_all = FALSE)

data_text |>
  glue::glue_data() |>
  purrr::modify(purrr::as_mapper(~ paste0(.x))) |>
  cat(data_text$result,
    file = "_verbal_text_raw.qmd",
    fill = TRUE,
    append = TRUE
  )
```

```{r}
#| label: qtbl-verbal
#| out-width: 60%
# GT table
xfun::pkg_attach2(c("gt", "dplyr", "glue", "webshot2", "gtExtras", "bwu"))

# more filtering for tables
# data <- dplyr::filter(data, test_name != "CVLT-3 Brief")
# data <- dplyr::filter(data, scale != "Orientation")
data <- dplyr::arrange(data, test_name)

# source note
source_note <- gt::md("*Note:* T-scores have a mean of 50 and a standard deviation of 10. Scaled scores have a mean of 10 and a standard deviation of 3.")

# run fc
table_verbal <- bwu::tbl_gt(
  data,
  table_name = "table_verbal",
  source_note = source_note
)
table_verbal

gt::gtsave(table_verbal, glue("table_verbal", ".png"), expand = 10)
gt::gtsave(table_verbal, glue("table_verbal", ".pdf"), expand = 10)

```

```{r}
#| label: fig-verbal
#| eval: true
#| column: page
#| out-width: 60%
#| fig-cap: "*Verbal/language* refers to the ability to access and apply acquired word knowledge, to verbalize meaningful concepts, to understand complex multistep instructions, to think about verbal information, and to express oneself using words."
xfun::pkg_attach(c(
  "gt", "tidyverse", "glue", "webshot2", "ggplot2", "ggthemes",
  "scales", "bwu"
))

# data for dotplot
data <- dplyr::filter(data, !is.na(percentile))
# exclude <- c("CVLT-3 Total Intrusions", "CVLT-3 Total Repetitions", "CVLT-3 Forced-Choice Recognition Hits")

# will need to change these for each domain
fig_verbal <- bwu::dotplot(
  data = data,
  x = data$z_mean_sub,
  y = data$subdomain,
  fill = x
)
fig_verbal

ggplot2::ggsave("fig_verbal.png")
ggplot2::ggsave("fig_verbal.pdf")

```

#| label: _tbl-md-verbal

#| tbl-cap: "Verbal/Language"
# markdown table; change label if want to use
markdown_table_typst <- function(data) {
  data.frame(
    data
  ) |>
    kableExtra::kbl(
      format = "markdown",
      table.envir = "figure",
      longtable = FALSE,
      booktabs = TRUE,
      linesep = "",
      align = c("lccc"),
      caption = "Verbal/Language",
      col.names = c("**Scale**", "**Score**", "**â€° Rank**", "**Range**")
    )
}
